title: Why everything happen to me....
body: Well, i just entered in a Ranked Flex game then this happened...ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT.. my internet was working fine so i waited 1 min.. i got reconnected then instantly again....ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT...i left the game to reconnect again but my team remaked the match....I GOT 5 MATCH LEAVE BUSTER FOR WHAT? attempting to reconnect while my internet was working fine... thx riot and yea.. I WAS IN PROMO!

replies.body: That messaging usually occurs when your network has lost connection to the game server, but attempting to get you back in.  It sounds like you were gone long enough to activate /rematch which had a passing vote.  Your best bet would be to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot the cause of this.  It's not possible to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but those steps can help prevent future occurrences.  I hope that helps!
